boardgame.name: The Dwarves
Die Zwerge
Die Zwerge Collectors Edition
boardgame.description: Based on the first novel of the Die Zwerge tetralogy [Eng. The Dwarves] by author Markus Heitz, the goal of the cooperative game Die Zwerge is to keep evil from flooding Girdlegard. During set-up, players choose one of the dwarves from the novel, each of which is equipped with a unique special ability and different stats for fighting, crafting, and movement._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Before each player's turn, the forces of evil usually break through one of the four big gates _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; which are guarded by different dwarven tribes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and further the spread of the Perished Land. On his turn a player spends two action points to use two of five actions. He can:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Fight against the advancing enemies (orcs, trolls, and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;auml;lfar [Ger. albae], i.e. dark elves)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Travel to other locations._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Lobby the dwarven council to give advantages to all players _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and without the favor of the dwarven council, everyone suffers disadvantages._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Solve a minor quest for rewards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Take on the current major quest, revealing the next major quest if successful. Completing these quests is the only way to win the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;For most of these actions, a player must succeed in a dice-driven challenge. If the players cannot control the flood of evil while simultaneously solving the major quests in time, they will lose._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Collector's edition:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;additional:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; New box cover_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 5 hand painted dwarf miniatures_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 10 cards Albae expansion_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 60 page artbook _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 5 art prints of the dwarfs _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A3 poster _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The smiting of Keenfire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; stein with motive _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Krasnolud_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; coaster _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;DIE ZWERGE_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; numbered COLLECTOR_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;S EDITION certificate._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

listing.notes: German Edition incl. Albae Expansion in German.
Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s edition. No beer mug, and the original paper wrapping has been removed. However, the box and components are pristine!

Played a couple of times. Within Europe payment by bank transfer is preferred. Shipping costs: €6,75 for Netherlands, between €9,00 and €12,00 (depending on country) for the rest of Europe, €18,00 for Russia and the rest of the world.

The game: Pegasus (c) 2012. GERMAN EDITION! Includes expansions _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Mit vereinten Kräften_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Albae-Erweiterung_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. All game materials are still in mint condition. Boxshows very light shelf wear. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.
Payment by bank transfer preferred. For 5€ extra I will add the expansion _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Mit vereinten Kräften_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;.
German Shipping Germany 5 Euro Shipping European Union 9 Euro Shipping World 15 Euro PayPal plus 2 Euro Money transfer via IBAN/BIC preferred
